Simple Comment demo

Welcome to the Simple Comment demo!

Simple Comment is designed as a barebones commenting system that is secure and customizable, so you can be confident that your visitors' data and online activity is secure and entirely under your (and their) control.

Want a public forum? Want a private space? Want to limit participation to specific IPs? Simple Comment doesn't judge!

Simple Comment is also scaleable, from free-tier to enterprise. It grows as your audience grows.

MIT licensing is available, so you can do what you want with the software. No strings.

Here on this page you can give it a test drive:

  • Comment as a visitor
  • Sign up and comment as an authenticated user
  • Edit and delete your own comments
  • Log out and comment anonymously
  • With an admin account, you could:
    • Lockdown any discussion entirely
    • Limit participation only to identified users
    • Delete inappropriate or annoying user comments
    • Hold comments from display for unidentified users until moderator review
    • Hold comments for all users
    • And more!
  • These settings are all easily customizable by policy, which can:
    • Disallow comments from unidentified visitors
    • Disallow unidentified visitors to read discussions
    • Allow only moderators to create new users
      • No public sign ups
    • Allow only moderators to delete users
    • Allow only moderators to delete or edit comments
    • Allow users total control over viewing, and editing, their own data.
      • Perfect if you're concerned about GDPR compliance!
    • Other policy flags, as requested
